scripts.build: bun build ./src/clock/clock.ts --outfile ./dist/clock/clock.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/clock && bun build ./src/identity/identity.ts --outfile ./dist/identity/identity.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/identity && bun build ./src/principal/principal.ts --outfile ./dist/principal/principal.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/principal --external @gooi/host-contracts/result && bun build ./src/replay-store/replay-store.ts --outfile ./dist/replay-store/replay-store.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/replay && bun build ./src/activation-policy/activation-policy.ts --outfile ./dist/activation-policy/activation-policy.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/activation-policy && bun build ./src/module-loader/module-loader.ts --outfile ./dist/module-loader/module-loader.js --external @gooi/host-contracts/module-loader
